translations.text: Say (O Muhammad صلى الله عليه وسلم): "He is Allâh, (the) One.<sup foot_note=155073>1</sup>
"Allâh-us-Samad (السيد الذي يصمد إليه في الحاجات) [Allâh the Self-Sufficient Master, Whom all creatures need, (He neither eats nor drinks)].
"He begets not, nor was He begotten.<sup foot_note=155074>1</sup>
"And there is none co-equal or comparable unto Him."

meta.translation_name: Muhammad Taqi-ud-Din al-Hilali & Muhammad Muhsin Khan
meta.author_name: Muhammad Taqi-ud-Din al-Hilali & Muhammad Muhsin Khan
